qas.question: How many different countries air American Idol on television?

context: American Idol is broadcast to <a0_0><a4_0>over 100<a4_0/><a0_0/> nations outside of the United States. In most nations these are not live broadcasts and may be tape delayed by several days or weeks. In Canada, the first thirteen seasons of American Idol were aired live by <a1_0><a5_0>CTV<a1_0/> and/or CTV Two<a5_0/>, in simulcast with Fox. CTV dropped Idol after its thirteenth season and in August <a2_0>2014<a2_0/>, <a3_0><a6_0>Yes TV<a6_0/><a3_0/> announced that it had picked up Canadian rights to American Idol beginning in its 2015 season.
